benchmark_details.name: GEM-Bench: A Benchmark for Ad-Injected Response Generation within Generative Engine Marketing
benchmark_details.overview: GEM-Bench is the first comprehensive benchmark for ad-injected response generation in Generative Engine Marketing. It includes three curated datasets, evaluation metrics capturing multiple dimensions of user satisfaction and engagement, and several baseline solutions for evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a systematic evaluation framework for ad-injected response generation in Generative Engine Marketing.

data.source: Three curated datasets: MT-Human, LM-Market, and CA-Prod.
data.size: 3 datasets, 6,556 ads in chatbot scenarios, 2,215 ads in search engine scenarios, 10-120 user queries depending on the dataset.
data.annotation: Manually verified and processed queries and advertisements with a multi-stage filtering and clustering pipeline.

methodology.calculation: Quantitative metrics based on cosine similarity and user satisfaction metrics based on LLM judges.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better user satisfaction and engagement.
methodology.validation: The evaluation includes both quantitative metrics and qualitative assessments by LLM judges.
